Text:
virus scan, says it's clean.

anyone tested this?
I wish someone could attest for this. All I know, it's an unsecure website asking for my login info.
Then make a new fresh account for GW and give them that login info...

you don't genuinely believe this would work do you?
If the dude could give a detailed description on how it does it then I'd be more inclined to believe what he is saying..
ArenaNet servers are secure as hell.

samshroom is right, it is IMPOSSIBLE to hack into the servers (atleast no with this "program")

I can also use Cheat Engine to hack my gold, but thats just for the show, becuase after loging off, it's gone.
